theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Glutathione Deficiency-Driven Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on glutathione depletion causing oxidative stress and mitochondrial dysfunction driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Glutathione Deficiency-Driven Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes glutathione synthesis decline and restoration reducing oxidative stress and improving mitochondrial function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Centers on mitochondria as primary ROS source causing oxidative damage and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights mitochondrial DNA damage by ROS and vicious cycle of mitochondrial dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mitochondrial ROS production, dysfunction, and feedback loop contributing to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial DNA mutation accumulation from ROS and resulting aging acceleration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial ROS-Induced Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details mitochondrial ROS production, damage, and vicious cycle impacting aging and male infertility.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Endocrine Oxidative Stress-Linked Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links oxidative stress from ROS to endocrine system aging, inflammation, and dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Hormesis and Adaptive Response Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on dual role of ROS as damaging agents and hormetic signaling molecules inducing adaptive defenses.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: ROS-Driven Gene Regulation Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes ROS as signaling molecules activating age-related gene expression and inflammatory pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Redox Signaling and Compartmentalized Oxidative Stress Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights compartment-specific oxidative stress effects and redox-sensitive signaling pathways in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Antioxidant Enzyme Role in Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on antioxidant enzymes like SOD in modulating oxidative damage and lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Antioxidant Enzyme Role in Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes enzymatic antioxidant defenses mitigating mitochondrial ROS and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Antioxidant Enzyme Role in Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes natural antioxidant enzymes (SOD, catalase) reducing ROS damage and extending lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Antioxidant Enzyme Role in Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on antioxidant enzymes modulating mitochondrial ROS and photoaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Antioxidant Enzyme Role in Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses balance of oxidative damage and antioxidant defenses correlating with aging clinical parameters.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Antioxidant Enzyme Role in Free Radical Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Covers antioxidant interventions reducing ROS damage and extending lifespan in model organisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lipid Peroxidation and Membrane Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative damage to membrane lipids, lipid peroxidation, and antioxidant ether lipids influencing aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lipid Peroxidation and Membrane Oxidative Damage Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights mitochondrial dysfunction and plasma membrane redox system protecting against lipid oxidative damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Antioxidant Intervention and ROS Homeostasis Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes antioxidant defense mechanisms and interventions reducing ROS accumulation to delay aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Antioxidant Intervention and ROS Homeostasis Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses ROS damage accumulation and effects of antioxidant supplementation on lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress in Life-History Trade-Offs Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on oxidative stress mediating trade-offs between reproduction, growth, and survival affecting aging.
